name: Myers, Appellant, v. Harrisburg Taxicab and Baggage Co., Inc.
name_abbreviation: Myers v. Harrisburg Taxicab & Baggage Co.

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Myers, Appellant, v. Harrisburg Taxicab and Baggage Co., Inc.

opinions.text:
Opinion
pbr Curiam,
The order appealed from is affirmed on the opinion of the court below.
Order affirmed, appellant to pay the costs.
opinions.author: pbr Curiam,

attorneys: Paul H. Rhoads, with him J. Mettler Pensyl and Rhoads & Sinon, for appellant.
F. Brewster Wickersham, with him Metzger & Wickersham, for appellee, was not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Myers, Appellant, v. Harrisburg Taxicab and Baggage Co., Inc.
Argued May 21, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
June 27, 1951:
Paul H. Rhoads, with him J. Mettler Pensyl and Rhoads & Sinon, for appellant.
F. Brewster Wickersham, with him Metzger & Wickersham, for appellee, was not heard.
